content: Welcome to the DAF-Core connectathon!! We plan to run conformance testing using touchstone and crucible tools for both DSTU2 and STU3. We are getting organized but will communicate here
Run your severs against the testing tool (touchstone or crucible) and add your information to tracker
chat here if you need help running the testing tools

Touchstone
-Run /ArgonautRe-FHIR1-0-2 for DSTU 2
-Run /Connectathon13/DAF for STU3

Crucible
- (DSTU2) https://beta.projectcrucible.org/
*Argonaut Resprint1 Test
*Argonaut Resprint2 Test
*Argonaut Resprint3 Test

- (STU3) https://projectcrucible.org/
...looking...
pasted image
Is anyone having trouble testing and need any help ?

For the connectathon-13-daf-allergyintolerance-search-json.03-DAFsearchParamIdentifierPatient, the search parameter is a reference to a patient resource. In our case, https://fhirsandbox1.tsysinteropsvcs.net:8100/sites/123/AllergyIntolerance?patient=https://fhirsandbox1.tsysinteropsvcs.net:8100/sites/123/Patient/5. Is there additional benefit to passing the reference vs. only the ID (that's already included in the request URL)?
Sicne it is at the same server is it not better to just have "Patient/5" as the reference rather than the full URL ?
Right. It seems simply passing the search parameter as patient=5 would be just as effective. We are using the Aegis Touchstone tool to test.

Hello everyone,
We would like to have a 10-15 minute discussion at the DAF desk and get a quick update and discuss the plans for tomorrow. We would appreciate if people can make it at 4:30 pm EST.

Thanks

Hello everyone,

Thank you for your feedback tonight.
What we need from all of you is to indicate in the spreadsheet the version of FHIR (DSTU2, STU3) indicated and the server name and Tool used to test so that we can summarize the results. IF we get this done by 10am tomorrow, it would be really appreciated. The link to the spreadsheet is below:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rrz8yqkG5gHhSEzUvZxP-6_CCFr_6F0FUElFRGmObyw/edit#gid=1058013156

In addition, we would like all of you to review the DAF Server conformance statement below and let us know if there are things here that are not supported by your server. We will organize a small 30 minutes to 1 hour session to gather this feedback tomorrow. If you have already commented on the ballot on this, then it wont be necessary.
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/daf/2016Sep/conformance-daf-query-responder.html

Thanks
Dragon
See you all tomorrow morning....have a good evening...

The touchstone test for MedicationStatement requires Identifier and InformationSource to be populated, but these fields are not on the profile page - http://hl7.org/fhir/us/daf/2016Sep/daf-core-medicationstatement.html
